SELECT si.id, si.gene_refgene, si.aachange_refgene, CONCAT(s.chrom, '-', s.pos) AS chromPos, si.exonicfunc_refgene, si.xref_refgene, sf.sick AS sample_name, si.popfreqmax, si.a1000g_all, si.a1000g_eas, si.exac_all, si.exac_eas, si.esp6500siv2_all, sf.mutation_ad, sf.mutation_mode, sf.mutation_rate FROM tbl_snp s JOIN tbl_snp_info si ON s.id = si.snp_id JOIN tbl_snp_format sf ON s.id = sf.snp_id WHERE si.popfreqmax > '0.' and si.popfreqmax <= '0.01' and si.aachange_refgene is not null and si.aachange_refgene not in ('UNKNOWN', 'unknown', '.', '') order by s.id
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_snp s JOIN tbl_snp_info si ON s.id = si.snp_id JOIN tbl_snp_format sf ON s.id = sf.snp_id WHERE si.popfreqmax > '0.' and si.popfreqmax <= '0.01' and si.aachange_refgene is not null and si.aachange_refgene not in ('UNKNOWN', 'unknown', '.', '') order by s.id
